dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 564 IH: Saving Taxpayers’ Money and Paying America’s Debt Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Moolenaar introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Oversight and Accountability

form.official-title: To rescind the unobligated balance of appropriations made by the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Saving Taxpayers’ Money and Paying America’s Debt Act.

section.header: Rescission of unobligated amounts under the American Rescue Plan Act
section.text: On the date of enactment of this Act, the unobligated balance of amounts made available by the American Rescue Plan Act of 2021 (Public Law 117–2) are hereby rescinded and shall be deposited into the general fund of the Treasury for the sole purpose of deficit reduction.
